sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Microsoft ( MSFT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.4%.
Year to date, Microsoft has lost about 3.7% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.9%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 1.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 0.6%, and Merck & Co. ( MRK ), trading up 0.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
